code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import authService from"../services/authService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=_ref=>{let{setRole}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const{role}=await authService.login(email,password);setRole(role);if(role==="barber"){navigate("/barber-dashboard");}else{navigate("/client-dashboard");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]});};export default LoginForm;
